description: A service provided by a vendor.

category.description: The category of service, e.g. software, platform, infrastructure, other

function.description: The functions provided by the service, e.g. access-review, database, load-balancing, other

endpoints.description: Array of service endpoints, e.g. ec2.amazonaws.com

fedrampModerate.description: Indicates whether this service is compliant with FedRAMP Moderate

hipaaEligible.description: Indicates whether this service is HIPPA eligible
